content.html: I know the right likes to point at the queer/trans community, and say that we censor things we don‚Äôt like, but here‚Äôs the thing: We may be asking you to stop buying books (or video games) written by awful people‚Ä¶ but we‚Äôre still not trying to ban them. I think that says a lot.
content.value:
